```{r, include = F}
setwd("~/Shrubs-Seedlings/code/Simulations/")
require(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
df <- read.csv("../../data/Derek_Plot_data.csv") %>% 
  arrange(Regen_Plot) %>% 
  tbl_df()
head(df)
```

# Look at how the different seed tree distance variables relate to each other 
```{r}
df %>% 
  select(seed_tree_distance_general, seed_tree_distance_conifer, seed_tree_distance_hardwood, seed_wall_distance) %>%   arrange(seed_tree_distance_conifer)
```

# Look a trends over time
```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x = ))
```

```{r}
df <- df %>% 
  filter(FIRE_SEV >3) %>% 
  mutate(Year_meas = as.numeric(substr(Date,1,4))) %>% 
  mutate(Years_since_fire = Year_meas - Year.of.Fire) %>% 
  dplyr::select(Years_since_fire, Year_meas, Date, everything())
df  
```
